subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Belmont Stakes
Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: Mr. Jerkens, a Hall of Fame thoroughbred trainer who was renowned for pulling upsets, trained colts that beat Secretariat twice in 1973 after his Triple Crown victory.
snippet: Mr. Jerkens, a Hall of Fame thoroughbred trainer who was renowned for pulling upsets, trained colts that beat Secretariat twice in 1973 after his Triple Crown victory.
